entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
